packs.name: Bottle 1 L Wishbone Plastic Advance Green (12)

marketing: Shell Advance SX 2 is a premium quality lubricant for 2-stroke motorcycle engines. It guarantees very good engine protection and cleanliness, reliable control against exhaust system blocking and reduces exhaust smoke. Shell Advance SX 2 is suitable both for all oil-injection and premix systems and meets the requirements of leading manufacturers.
